description: DND has a requirement for a man-portable set of tools that provide the capability to lift, spread,cut and stabilize various materials and heavy objects in support of the extrication of personnelthat have been trapped in a collapsed building or damaged vehicle as a result of combatoperations. This tool set will be referred to as the Extraction Kit

full_summary:
================================

**Tender Notice: Extraction Kits and Accessories**
----------------------------------------------------

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-5477-10425362
* **Solicitation Number**: W6399-23-LM84/A
* **Publication Date**: May 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 26, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 3, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 2, 2026

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a request for a Standing Offer (SO) for Extraction Kits, consisting of  mobile tools designed to lift, spread, cut, and stabilize materials and heavy objects. The kit will aid in the extraction of personnel trapped in collapsed buildings or damaged vehicles as a result of combat operations.

The Contractor will be required to supply the extraction kit and provide training and support services as per the contract specifications.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the combination of Technical Merit and Price. Technical Merit will account for 70% of the evaluation, while Price will account for 30%.

### Trade Agreements

The tender is open to contractors who are members of the following trade agreements:

* Canada- European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* ... (full list of trade agreements)

### Contact Information

* Name: Austin Sanford
* Email: Austin.Sanford@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 993-6864

### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the terms and conditions, can be found at the following URLs:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5477/w6399-23-lm84---dglepm-rfso_en.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5477/w6399-23-lm84---dglepm-rfso_fr.pdf>

### Notice of Expiration

The tender notice has expired. This tender is no longer accepting submissions. ^[_^author prof]
